Description.Text:
The World Center Hotel is located in the heart of Lower Manhattan, on the south side of the World Trade Center, with unfettered views of what will become the United States most famous landmark, the 1776 foot Freedom Tower as well as the rising September 11th Memorial & Museum. A newly constructed hotel that offers the latest in guestroom and hotel design in an unforgettable, unique location. This upscale, full service hotel provides a secure, quiet atmosphere including a 24 hour Guest Service Desk/Concierge, instant guest registration, free Internet access throughout the hotel (including guestrooms), free use of computer/printer workstations in the lounge and business center that also features coffee, tea, magazines and games for your pleasure. Guests also have complimentary use of an onsite fitness room. Sleek guestrooms are both comfortable and efficient and offer an alarm clock with iPod docking station, LCD TV with multi-media connectivity, custom designed, soft elm wood furnishings with luxury bedding and linens and a frosted glass-top desk that contributes to the airy ambiance of the room and features an ergonomically designed chair. Other amenities include Gilchrist & Soames toiletries, hairdryer, coffee maker, earth-friendly bathroom fixtures and an electronic, touch screen temperature control device, which is programmed for energy efficiency and is located bedside for your convenience. Rounding out our guestroom amenities are in-room high-speed Internet access and chilled, filtered, bottled water stations on every floor both complimentary. Each room has double paned, floor-to-ceiling windows allowing for tremendous views of downtown Manhattan while limiting the sounds from outdoors. Adding to the hotels special location and contemporary design, is its View of the World Terrace Club. This private club and restaurant is situated on the top floor of the hotel with breathtaking views and year-round indoor/outdoor dining. Multi-menu room service is also available from a variety of area restaurants. In the midst of downtown Manhattan,the World Center Hotel is minutes from world class shopping, restaurants, bars and entertainment. Wall Street, the Financial District, Tribeca, Soho, Battery Park Citys scenic waterfront, the World Financial Center as well as the ferry to the Statue of Liberty/Ellis Island are all nearby.
The World Center Hotel is targeting the LEED 'gold' certificate for environmentally sustainable design, construction & operation. World Center Hotel uses energy saving programs and electrical appliances, renewable materials in construction, eco-showerheads and dual flush toilets, low energy lighting throughout the hotel, automatic room occupancy sensors and management policies to turn off systems when not required along with various recycling programs.

Located in the heart of downtown Manhattan, the World Center Hotel is not only surrounded by some of the most powerful corporations and organizations in the world, it is situated directly across from the rising World Trade Center September 11 Memorial & Museum and Freedom Tower. Those familiar with downtown NYC will recognize that Wall Street, the Financial District, the World Financial Center and Battery Park City are just steps away from the World Center Hotel. Guests can enjoy some of the neighborhood's best attractions including the Winter Garden Shops and Restaurants at the World Financial Center, Fraunces Tavern Museum, the waterfront of Battery Park City and locals' favorite department store, Century 21.
